summary: Comprehensive testing of FLUX-DNA Neural-First Architecture completed. All 12 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI testing verified Quick Exit button, language selection, neural directive handling, and chat interface working correctly.

issues: Conversation UI layout could be wider on desktop - currently left-aligned with significant empty space on right (noted in previous iteration)

critical_code_review_comments: Neural Router correctly detects distress keywords and triggers sanctuary mode
Neural Router correctly detects crisis keywords and triggers guardian mode with emergency_resources=true
Assessment Complete API correctly transitions to ceremonial mode with confetti UI command
Vault Submit API returns ai_analysis with risk_level based on content analysis
OSINT Check API returns risk_score and risk_level correctly
Frontend correctly handles neural directives to change pulse colors and show Quick Exit
Frontend shows language selection (English/Arabic) on assessment page
seed_data_creation: None - tests use dynamic data creation
context_for_next_testing_agent: Neural-First Architecture fully tested. All neural directive features working: 1) Assessment Start returns neural_directive with detected_state and ui_commands, 2) Normal messages keep phoenix mode, 3) Distress keywords trigger sanctuary mode, 4) Crisis keywords trigger guardian mode with emergency_resources=true, 5) Assessment Complete triggers ceremonial mode with confetti, 6) Vault Submit returns ai_analysis with risk_level, 7) OSINT Check returns risk_score. Frontend shows Quick Exit button, language selection, and handles neural directives correctly.

features_tested.assessment_start_neural_directive: ✅ Returns neural_directive with detected_state='curious' and ui_commands.pulse_color
features_tested.assessment_start_high_osint_risk: ✅ High OSINT risk (>0.7) triggers sanctuary mode with cloak_mode=true
features_tested.assessment_message_normal: ✅ Normal message keeps mode as 'phoenix' with detected_state='assessment'
features_tested.assessment_message_distress: ✅ Distress keywords ('scared', 'trapped', 'controls') trigger sanctuary mode with enable_quick_exit=true
features_tested.assessment_message_crisis: ✅ Crisis keywords ('suicide', 'end it', 'tonight') trigger guardian mode with emergency_resources=true and pulse_color='red'
features_tested.assessment_complete_ceremonial: ✅ Complete API transitions to ceremonial mode with show_confetti=true and pulse_color='gold'
features_tested.vault_submit_ai_analysis: ✅ Returns ai_analysis with risk_level (HIGH/CRITICAL for threat keywords, LOW for neutral)
features_tested.frontend_quick_exit: ✅ Quick Exit button visible and functional
features_tested.frontend_language_selection: ✅ English and Arabic language buttons present and working
features_tested.frontend_neural_directive_handling: ✅ Frontend correctly handles neural directives to change pulse colors and show emergency resources
features_tested.frontend_chat_interface: ✅ Chat input, send button, and message bubbles working correctly
